name: FHEMConnector
0:
”Alexa, switch on the Light”
”Alexa, set Heating Office to 21 Degrees”
”Alexa, what is the Temperature in the Kitchen?”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
This Skill connects the Open-Source Homeautomation System FHEM.

A working FHEM Installation ist Required for this Skill. The account linking key can be queried with 'get <alexa> proxyKey' from the alexa device in FHEM. This ID is then entered into the page that is opened when activating the skill.

More Information can be found here: https://wiki.fhem.de/wiki/FHEM_Connector_for_Amazon_Alexa

This skill supports switches (on and off), lights (on, off, brightness, color temperatuire, color), blinds, thermometers, thermostats, contact sensors, motion detectors, Doorlocks, Alarms und Scenes as well as Speakers, Channel-, Playback- und InputControllers.

A list of supported SmartHome (and other) Capabilities can be found here: https://wiki.fhem.de/wiki/FHEM_Connector_for_Amazon_Alexa#Supported_Devices

Support through the Forum, search for „FHEM Connector".
